name: Beasts & Bumpkins
content:
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Beasts and Bumpkins/beasts.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: bbsummer.fat
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Beasts and Bumpkins/
    src: $DISC
- execute:
    command: chmod -R a+rwx "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Beasts and Bumpkins/"
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: Audio
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Worldweaver Productions\Beasts and Bumpkins
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: c:\Beasts and Bumpkins\audio.box
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: CD
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Worldweaver Productions\Beasts and Bumpkins
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: c:\\Beasts and Bumpkins\\
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: InstallDir
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Worldweaver Productions\Beasts and Bumpkins
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: \\Beasts and Bumpkins\\
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: InstallDrive
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Worldweaver Productions\Beasts and Bumpkins
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 'c:'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: Installed
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Worldweaver Productions\Beasts and Bumpkins
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '1'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: Language
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Worldweaver Productions\Beasts and Bumpkins
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '0'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: Misc
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Worldweaver Productions\Beasts and Bumpkins
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: c:\\Beasts and Bumpkins\\misc.box
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: Missions
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Worldweaver Productions\Beasts and Bumpkins
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: c:\\Beasts and Bumpkins\\missions.box
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: MissionText
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Worldweaver Productions\Beasts and Bumpkins
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: c:\\Beasts and Bumpkins\\mistext0.box
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: Speech
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Worldweaver Productions\Beasts and Bumpkins
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: c:\\Beasts and Bumpkins\\speech0.box
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: Video
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Worldweaver Productions\Beasts and Bumpkins
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: c:\\Beasts and Bumpkins\\video.box
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: Working
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Worldweaver Productions\Beasts and Bumpkins
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: c:\\Beasts and Bumpkins\\
